title: India is so Incredible and Beautiful (Saim Rizvi)
text: By Saim Rizvi Jul 3, 2015 India is known for its beautiful holiday destination, picturesque beauty and cultural diversity. People from far across the world come to India to enjoy the beautiful climate and the marvelous charm of the city and village life. Due to the cultural diversity, every corner of the country is different from each other. From languages, to dresses, from cuisines to people, you can find everything different from one part to another part of the country. However, though it is a diverse company, love binds the people from heart to heart. They welcome tourist from different regions with warm heart. Bespoke tour India takes you to the marvelous part of India which one has never seen before. A place with so many beautiful attractions, India is a true blessing of Mother Nature. What makes India different? From villages to cities, India is completely different from the rest of the world. The metropolitan cities has every modern amenities and facilities, however, villages have the charm of natural beauty. If you are coming for holiday in India , then it is important to relish both the life of cities and villages. Cuisines you have not tasted ever The essence of every Indian cuisine is different, however, the common thing about Indian food is different kinds of spices and herbs are used to bring taste in the food. The different cuisines uses blend of spices, which can relish the mood. In north India, you can find food made with lots of spices; however, south Indian cuisines are much lighter. In the east, you will be overwhelmed with the unique non-vegetarian dishes. However, west is known for unique vegetarian cuisines. A destination for shopaholics If you love shopping, then India is a paradise for shopaholics. You can find many beautiful clothes, jewelry, footwear, accessories and much more to look perfect. Many foreigners love to come to India and find beautiful stuff for themselves. If you choose India holiday packages , then it becomes very easy to find destinations where you can binge on shopping. Choose the best range of clothes or handicrafts as there are plenty of products available. Apart from such beautiful things, you can find many beautiful destinations. You can get a picturesque beauty of pristine lakes, mountains and many things that are more beautiful. Ladakh, Kerala, Gujarat and many more other places are there which can give you thrill. If you love roaming around, then India can be your next destination. About the Author Book India Holiday helps explore incredible India. The company makes sure that every person's travel experience is perfect and superb. We plan vacations that take you to the most amazing places around India.
